# Queen of the Road

| runtime        = 98 mins
| country        = Australia
| language       = English
| budget         =
}}
Queen of the Road is a 1984 Australian television film about two female truckies.
Cast
* Joanne Samuel as Rosy Costello
* Amanda Muggleton as Gayle O'Reagan
* Chris Haywood
* Brian Moll as Al 'Herpie' Graves
* Jonathan Sweet as Max
